content: PFCU is a proud supporter of the Greater Chicago Food Depository. This past November, we ran a food & cash donation drive. Our members donated $5,375 and we matched donations nearly dollar-per-dollar. Today, we presented the GCFD with a $10,000 check.  #mypfcu @FoodDepository

Donâ€™t lose your SNAP benefits. Take these steps by Feb. 1st:
1) Update your information with IDHS
2) Review work requirements and exemptions
3) Share info on updated rules with your family and friends

Visit chicagosfoodbank.org/snap for more info & support. @FoodDepository

Families waiting on SNAP can still get help.
 
The @FoodDepository is setting up extra food distribution sites every Saturday in November, offering prepacked grocery boxes for those who need support.

Food banks are stepping up, but itâ€™s not enough. President Trump needs to release the emergency funds NOW.
We support @PAWSChicago  + @FoodDepository . If you have a local org doing great work, reply with their name; weâ€™re always looking for places to support.
